title: De-influencing news influencers
description: For the last few years in my Nieman Lab predictions, I’ve discussed the convergence of journalists and influencers. But if influencers are becoming journalists and journalists are becoming influencers, is it possible to de-influence the news the same way we have de-influenced products from books, makeup, water bottles, and more? De-influencing has been described as...
